 interface CategorySampleModel
           
 

Classes in dr.evomodel.sitemodel that implement SiteModel
 class CategorySiteModel
          CategorySiteModel - A SiteModel that has a different rate for each category;
 class DirichletSiteModel
          DirichletSiteModel - A SiteModel that has a free rate parameter for each category.
 class GammaSiteBMA
           
 class GammaSiteModel
          GammaSiteModel - A SiteModel that has a gamma distributed rates across sites.
 class SampleStateAndCategoryModel
          SampleStateAndCategoryModel - A SiteModel that has a discrete distribution of substitutionmodels over sites designed for sampling of rate categories.
 class SampleStateModel
          DiscreteSampleModel - A SiteModel that has a discrete distribution of substitutionmodels over sites designed for sampling of rate categories.
